name: MachineLearning AI
description:
Currently doing my Master’s research on Machine Learning NPCs.

I added Reinforcement Learning Agents to Street Fighter II CE to see how players perceive their skill.

Do you want to see how the A.I. learns and plays over time?

Play against random machine learning NPCs and see how they perform. Answer a survey after each fight to note your opinion.

5 Levels - 5 NPCs 

Game playthrough of approx. 10 min.
